HomePage.signUp: Don't have an account? Create One.
HomePage.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Inventory! We're thrilled to have you here. Manage your orders and purchases effortlessly with our intuitive platform. Let's get started on making your order management seamless and efficient!

Auth.passwordTooSimple: Password must include uppercase, lowercase letters, a number, and a special character.
